params._nodeAddress: Address of the node that will own the batch
params._owner: Address that pays for the batch, but not the owner of the batch

returns._0: Array of BatchInfo for the owner

params._newAdmin: The address of the new admin

params._newSwarmContractAddress: New address of the swarm contract

createBatchRegistry(address,address,uint.notice: Creates a new batch and registers the payer

getBatchPayer(bytes32).notice: Get the payer address for a specific batch ID

getOwnerBatchCount(address).notice: Get the number of batches for a specific owner

getOwnerBatches(address).notice: Get all batches for a specific owner

transferAdmin(address).notice: Transfer admin rights to a new address
